about:
Hi, my name is Jaskirat and welcome to my personal portfolio website! I have a Bachelor of Computer Science from the University of Waterloo, with a specialization in Software Engineering and a minor in Economics. I am currently searching for full-time job opportunities in any software engineering related positions.

 As a fast learner, I have the ability to quickly adapt to new technologies and environments, ensuring that I can hit the ground running in any project I undertake. My eagerness to work both within and beyond my areas of expertise is driven by a genuine passion for exploring new challenges and expanding my knowledge and skillset. Whether it's diving into unfamiliar codebases, learning new programming languages, or collaborating on interdisciplinary projects, I am always ready to contribute my best work.

 If you're an employer or if you want to connect and discuss potential opportunities or shared interests, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I'm always open to engaging in conversations and exploring how we can work together to create impactful solutions. Let's connect and make something great happen!
